name: React (El_Bruh)
description:
React is an infinite runner inspired by the classic infinite runner: Cube Runner. The goal is to get the furthest distance you can. There are plans to add networking features so that you can see the best scores of other players, but that's in the future. For now everything is local. Hope you enjoy.

There is an android version on the Google Play Store, but is hasn't been updated in a while and doesn't have all the features and optimizations that exist in this one.
